item.title: February 8, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Going to experiment with adding a microblog to the site. The idea is simple: quick notes and observations that don’t need the full treatment of a blog post. Sometimes you just want to jot down a thought. Inspired by the “Moments” section on aishepherd.nl by Jeroen Dee.

How to secure your agent? You can’t. You can try to put some instructions, but if it has bash access, it can just do about everything.

item.title: February 8, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Been experimenting with adding a microblog to the site. The idea is simple: quick notes and observations that don’t need the full treatment of a blog post. Sometimes you just want to jot down a thought.

Found an interesting article on static site generation patterns — the approach of pre-rendering everything at build time keeps things beautifully simple.

Kotlin’s when expression is basically pattern matching done right. Java’s switch got better with sealed classes, but Kotlin had this figured out years ago. Sometimes being second to market means being first to get it right.
